name: Papa Vinny's Barbershop
description:
Papa Vinny's Barbershop is based off the video of the same name on GiantBomb.com.

This is submitted as a tiny, super-simplistic game for the Giant ROM - Giant Bomb Game Jam. I wanted to add in a victory condition or even re-growable hair but didn't have the time. So, just shave and then look at that bald head!

Logo by GB user Hamst3r.
Song is "Ragtime Dance" by Scott Joplin.
